埻字的基本解释

埻
zhǔn
堤。
古通“准”。

埻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhǔn］
［《廣韻》之尹切，上準，章。］
(1)射的，箭靶。
(2)标准。
[②]［guó］
［《廣韻》古博切，入鐸，見。］
［《廣韻》古獲切，入麥，見。］
见“埻2端”。

埻字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埻； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页231第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?之尹切，音準。射的。【周禮】或作準。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?朱閏切，音甽。壘土也。　又【集韻】徒臥切，音憜。亦曰射堋。　又都回切，音堆。攢塗所覆。　又光鑊切，音郭。流沙中有埻端國。見【山海經】。

埻字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
埻字的起名意思

指箭靶的中心，堤，或准确的意思。

Xian
Basic explanation of words
Xian
zhǔn
embankment.
Gutong "quasi".
Xian
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhǔn］
[Yin cut in "Guang Yun", first quasi, chapter. ]
(1) Shooting, archery target.
(2) Standards.
[②]［guó］
["Guangyun" Gu Boqie, enter the priest, see you. ]
["Guangyun" is cut in ancient times, enter the wheat, see you. ]
See "Yi 2 End".
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [Tu Zi Department] 　埻; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 231-16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? The Yin cut, the pronunciation is accurate. Shot. [Zhou Li] Or as accurate.　[Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun]? Zhu Run cut, the sound is 甽. Base soil also.　 [Ji Yun] Lying and cutting, sound 憜. It is also called shooting.　All cut back again, sound pile. Zantu covered.　Guang Wok cut again, Yin Guo. There is a country in the quicksand. See [Shan Hai Jing].
Xian
